contentList.content: When resurrected, you resurrect to full health. You begin combat with maximum AP.
Pet Pal enables you to talk to animals. Also increases your maximum number of summons by 1, but reduces their damage and Vitality by 50%.
Arrow Recovery provides a 33% chance to recover a special arrow after shooting it, and removes the close-quarters damage penalty of ranged weapons.
Increases all damage by 2% per point. Damage dealt with weapons are further increased by 3% and damaging statuses by 5% per point. Allows you to lift and carry heavier items.
Increases all damage by 2% per point. Damage dealt by skills is further increased by 3% and Accuracy by 1% per point.

Walk It Off reduces all status durations by 1 turn, including positive statuses. Does not affect statuses with a duration of 1 turn. Also increases all resistances by 10% each time you are hit by a character, up to a maximum of 50%, until the next turn.
Increases all damage by 3% per point. Dodge is increased by 1% and movement by 0.15m per AP per point.
Leech heals you when standing in blood. Also increases Lifesteal by 25%.
Stench decreases everyone's attitude towards you by [2], but melee opponents find you less attractive in combat. Increases your Poison resistance by 30% and makes you immune to Diseased and Infected.
[1] lets you evade attacks of opportunity. Increases your Dodge by 5% and Movement by 1m per AP.
Mnenomic doubles all points invested in Memory.

A character with [1] has an extra 30% [3], but takes a [4]% penalty to [5]. Additionally, the maximum [3] is raised by [6]. Demon grants 20% additional damage on all Burning and Necrofire statuses you apply to enemies. Ice King increases all Water damage you deal by 20%.
[1] allows you to flee combat even when enemies are close by. Provides immunity to Crippled, Entangled and Enwebbbed.
While above 75% Vitality, Hothead provides 10% Critical Chance and 10% Accuracy.
Ambidextrous reduces the cost of using grenades and scrolls by 1 AP when your off-hand is free. Provides 2 free equipment switches per turn.
Shadow
[1] adds an extra [2]m range to your grenade throws and increase their damage by 30%.
Duelist increases AP Start and Recovery by 1, and Max AP by 1, if you are wielding a Single-Handed weapon with a free off-hand.
Duelist
Dual-Wielding increases damage and Dodging when wielding two Single-Handed weapons, and increases off-hand damage by 10% per point.
Dual-Wielding
[1] increases damage and Critical Chance when using bows and crossbows. Also increases the range by 0.5m per point when wielding a bow, crossbow or wand(s).

Single-Handed increases damage and Accuracy when using a single-handed weapon (dagger, sword, axe, mace or wand) with a shield or empty off-hand. Increases armours by 6% and resistances by 2% per point.
Two-Handed increases damage and Critical Multiplier when using two-handed melee weapons (swords, axe, mace, spear or staff). Also grants 2% Accuracy per point.
The first skill used during your turn has its cooldown reduced by 1 turn.

Perseverance restores Magic Armour on recovering from Frozen or Stunned, and restores Physical Armour on recovering from Knocked Down or Petrified. Additionally, 2% of maximum Vitality is restored per point.

Your chance to Critically Strike when attacking with a weapon or when using a weapon-based skill. If you Backstab, your Critical Chance is converted to additional damage in a ratio of 1% Critical Chance to 1% damage.
The damage you inflict when successfully hitting an enemy or object.
[1] grants Dodging and Resistance bonuses to all allies in a 16m radius.
Damage is based on your level and receives an additional bonus from Intelligence.
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives an additional bonus from both Strength and Intelligence.
Explode target corpse, dealing [1] in the area.
Explode all corpses around you, dealing [1] in the area.
Receive Sparkstriker status. This causes your melee attacks to create a Spark projectile that bounces off the initial target to hit the closest enemy, dealing [1].
Target character and surrounding allies receive Sparkmaster status that make melee attacks firing sparks that can fork twice at nearby enemies. Each spark hit deals [1].
Deals [1] to the target character and set Atrophy. If target character is carrying grenades or arrows, a random one explodes in their inventory.
Explode two random grenades or arrows in the inventories of every enemy, dealing [1] and set Atrophy in a target circle.
Throw an explosive trap at target location. Trap takes 1 turn to activate. When active, the trap will explode when a character approaches it, dealing [1].
Throw [1] explosive traps at target locations. Each trap takes a turn to activate. When active, trap will explode when a character approaches it, dealing [2].
Flaming Tongues protect you, immediately attacking approaching enemies and deals them [1].
Elemental Weapons
Target a surface in melee radius. Elemental damage matching that surface is added to your weapon attacks and weapon-based skills.
Sets off a chain reaction that causes ice areas to explode into water puddles, dealing [1] and setting Chilled.
Water Weapons
Bloody Weapons
Burning Weapons
Poison Weapons
Electric Weapons
Oily Weapons
[1] gives you [2]% Dodging while dual wielding. Once per turn, the first dodge do not trigger Dodge Fatigue.
Offhand penalty: [1]%
Your inner demon actively watches over you. When an enemy approaches in melee range, they will be pummelled by a demonic fist dealing [1].
Destroy [1] on target enemy. They are Terrified for 1 turn.
+[1] point(s) = +[2]% to all Damage, +[3]% more for weapon-based attacks and +[4]% more damage dealt by statuses.
+[1] point(s) = +[2]% on all Damage, +[3]% Dodge and [4]m of movement per AP.
+[1] point(s) = +[2]% to all Damage, +[3]% more for skills and +[4]% Accuracy.
Total damage: [1]-[2]
Level [1]: +[2]% Damage, +[3]% Dodging and increase Offhand damage by [4]%.
Next Level [1]: +[2]% Damage, +[3]% Dodging and increase Offhand damage by [4]%.
Level [1]: +[2]% Damage, +[3]% Critical Chance and increase Range by [4]m.
Next Level [1]: +[2]% Damage, +[3]% Critical Chance and increase Range by [4]m.
Level [1]: +[2]% Damage, +[3]% accuracy, +[4]% armours and +[5]% to Elemental Resistances.

content.comment: Single handed dynamic tooltip current new

contentList.content: Next Level [1]: +[2]% Damage, +[3]% accuracy, +[4]% armours and +[5]% to Elemental Resistances.
Level [1]: +[2]% Damage, +[3]% Critical Multiplier and [4]% Accuracy.
Next Level [1]: +[2]% Damage, +[3]% Critical Multiplier and [4]% Accuracy.
Level [1]: +[2]% Armour and +[3]% Vitality restored after a hard Crowd Control effect recovery.
Next Level [1]: +[2]% Armour and +[3]% Vitality restored after a hard Crowd Control effect recovery.
Increases all Skill damage by [1]%.
Increase all Skill damage by [1]% (stackable when dual-wielding)
Receive a [1]% Damage penalty if the target is closer than [2] meters
From Attributes : [1]%
From Strength weapon bonus : [1]%
Skills gets a bonus of +[1]% from Intelligence
Offhand penalty: [1]% (penalty reduced by [2]% from Dual-Wielding)
